app.title: BrightByte
app.presentation: Who are you? Please, select your identity file and enter the security passphrase. Login in is a local operation, no information will be sent to any server or node.

app.explanationText: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally.
